param.name: account
param.description: List resources by account. Must be used with the domainId parameter.

param.name: acltype
param.description: list networks by ACL (access control list) type. Supported values are Account and Domain

param.name: domainid
param.description: list only resources belonging to the domain specified

param.name: isrecursive
param.description: defaults to false, but if true, lists all resources from the parent specified by the domainId till leaves.

param.name: issystem
param.description: true if network is system, false otherwise

param.name: listall
param.description: If set to false, list only resources belonging to the command's caller; if set to true - list resources that the caller is authorized to see. Default value is false

param.name: physicalnetworkid
param.description: list networks by physical network id

param.name: restartrequired
param.description: list network offerings by restartRequired option

param.name: specifyipranges
param.description: true if need to list only networks which support specifying ip ranges

param.name: supportedservices
param.description: list network offerings supporting certain services

param.name: type
param.description: the type of the network. Supported values are: Isolated and Shared

param.name: zoneid
param.description: the Zone ID of the network

response.name: id
response.description: the id of the network

response.name: account
response.description: the owner of the network

response.name: acltype
response.description: acl type - access type to the network

response.name: broadcastdomaintype
response.description: Broadcast domain type of the network

response.name: broadcasturi
response.description: broadcast uri of the network

response.name: cidr
response.description: the cidr the network

response.name: displaytext
response.description: the displaytext of the network

response.name: dns1
response.description: the first DNS for the network

response.name: dns2
response.description: the second DNS for the network

response.name: domain
response.description: the domain name of the network owner

response.name: domainid
response.description: the domain id of the network owner

response.name: gateway
response.description: the network's gateway

response.name: isdefault
response.description: true if network is default, false otherwise

response.name: issystem
response.description: true if network is system, false otherwise

response.name: name
response.description: the name of the network

response.name: netmask
response.description: the network's netmask

response.name: networkdomain
response.description: the network domain

response.name: networkofferingavailability
response.description: availability of the network offering the network is created from

response.name: networkofferingdisplaytext
response.description: display text of the network offering the network is created from

response.name: networkofferingid
response.description: network offering id the network is created from

response.name: networkofferingname
response.description: name of the network offering the network is created from

response.name: physicalnetworkid
response.description: the physical network id

response.name: project
response.description: the project name of the address

response.name: projectid
response.description: the project id of the ipaddress

response.name: related
response.description: related to what other network configuration

response.name: restartrequired
response.description: true network requires restart

response.name: specifyipranges
response.description: true if network supports specifying ip ranges, false otherwise

response.name: state
response.description: state of the network

response.name: subdomainaccess
response.description: true if users from subdomains can access the domain level network

response.name: traffictype
response.description: the traffic type of the network

response.name: type
response.description: the type of the network

response.name: vlan
response.description: the vlan of the network

response.name: zoneid
response.description: zone id of the network

response.name: zonename
response.description: the name of the zone the network belongs to

response.name: service
response.description: the list of services
